scripts.postinstall: npm run patch-m1-bazel && npm run patch-m1-ibazel && npm run patch-m1-buildifier
scripts.patch-m1-bazel: test "$(uname -s)" = 'Darwin' && echo Patching Bazel for Apple M1 architecture compatibility && ln -fs ./bazelisk-darwin_amd64 node_modules/@bazel/bazelisk/bazelisk-darwin_arm64 || echo 'Skipping M1 arch patching'
scripts.patch-m1-ibazel: test "$(uname -s)" = 'Darwin' && echo Patching iBazel for Apple M1 architecture compatibility && sed -i .bak "s/'x64' : 'amd64',\$/'x64' : 'amd64', 'arm64' : 'amd64',/" ./node_modules/@bazel/ibazel/index.js || echo 'Skipping M1 arch patching'
scripts.patch-m1-buildifier: test "$(uname -s)" = 'Darwin' && echo Patching Buildifier for Apple M1 architecture compatibility && sed -i .bak "s/'x64' : 'amd64',\$/'x64' : 'amd64', 'arm64' : 'amd64',/" ./node_modules/@bazel/buildifier/buildifier.js || echo 'Skipping M1 arch patching'
scripts.bazel:format: find . -type f \( -name "*.bzl" -or -name WORKSPACE -or -name BUILD -or -name BUILD.bazel \) ! -path "*/node_modules/*" | xargs buildifier -v --warnings=attr-cfg,attr-license,attr-non-empty,attr-output-default,attr-single-file,constant-glob,ctx-actions,ctx-args,depset-iteration,depset-union,dict-concatenation,duplicated-name,filetype,git-repository,http-archive,integer-division,load,load-on-top,native-build,native-package,out-of-order-load,output-group,package-name,package-on-top,positional-args,redefined-variable,repository-name,same-origin-load,string-iteration,unsorted-dict-items,unused-variable
scripts.reset: npm run _install && npm run bootstrap && npm run _unlink
scripts.release:patch: npm run verify-git-not-dirty && npm run _install && npm run bootstrap && npm run build && lerna version patch --yes && lerna run build:unpkg:dist --no-private && ALLOW_PUBLISH=true lerna publish from-package --yes
scripts.release:minor: npm run verify-git-not-dirty && npm run _install && npm run bootstrap && npm run build && lerna version minor --yes && lerna run build:unpkg:dist --no-private && ALLOW_PUBLISH=true lerna publish from-package --yes
scripts.release:prerelease:dev: npm run build && lerna version prerelease --yes && lerna run build:unpkg:dist --no-private && ALLOW_PUBLISH=true lerna publish from-package --dist-tag dev --yes
scripts.release:dev: npm run _install && npm run bootstrap && npm run release:prerelease:dev
